overview: Munay, a lovable older lady, 75 years old, radically burns all bridges after 27 years of Black Forest idyll in order to find herself. She doesn't want a shared flat for senior citizens or a small room with concrete walls to become her new home - she just wants to get out into her beloved nature... Her journey on foot takes her right across Germany. From Constance to Flensburg. Alone, with a small tent and light luggage. Documentary Filmmaker Mario Kanzinger and his team accompanied her with the camera. Munay herself kept a mobile phone diary. From these authentic recordings, an intimate documentary film was made: "Munay dances - a special journey".
title: Munay tanzt - Eine Besondere Reise
